title: Kate’s Got That Gravitational Pull
description:
This week on “Bachelor Happy Hour,” Kate joins Becca and Michelle for an honest girl chat about her experience on “Paradise” so far. Kate discusses what it was really like to arrive during split week, who she was hoping to see on the beach, and, of course, her connections with Jacob and Logan. Plus, she explains her side of a certain uncomfortable conversation. 

Don’t forget to rate and subscribe so you never miss an episode.

This episode is brought to you by BetterHelp. Give online therapy a try at betterhelp.com/bachelor
